entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow changing to snow this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
